text:
Ah,
I know I asked for the day off, but...

I've been working hard on practicing
the new song too, you know?

We've got recording sessions,
and TV show recordings coming up too.

Don't worry,
Your efforts are coming through loud and clear, Hana.

...And besides,
especially when things are busy like this──

When it's time to rest, make sure to rest properly,
I want you to refresh yourself.

As the Producer says,
I'll make sure to enjoy my day off properly.
"Enjoy it as if you're back in high school"──!
